Name: Score Reduction
Desc: Choose a color and reduce all cubes of that color by 1 unit

Name: Code Extermination
Desc: Choose any area and clear all cubes in that row once

Name: Melody Simplification
Desc: Choose a color and divide all blocks of that color into 1-unit blocks.

Name: Sequence Reset
Desc: Choose any 2 areas and swap their locations

Name: Domain Recovery
Desc: Choose any 2 adjacent cubes and swap their locations

Name: Freeze Convert
Desc: Freeze the ascending bar once. No cubes will be ascended starting the next round (This effect can be stacked up to 3 times.)

Name: Directed Movement
Desc: Choose any area and snap all cubes in that row in the chosen direction.

Name: Random Function α
Desc: Randomly select a color and apply a random effect to it. (Random effects: Structural Adjustment, Data Simplification, Parameter Inflation, and Filter Inflation)

Name: Random Function β
Desc: Randomly select a column and apply a random effect to it. (Random effects: Code Extermination, Sequence Reset, and Directed Movement)

Name: Restore Parameter
Desc: Randomly purify 1 Special Cube (no effect if none exists).

Name: Parameter Inflation
Desc: Choose a color and add 8 units to all cubes of that color.

Name: Sustain
Desc: Select a color. Generate multiple unit cubes of the same color in the empty spaces adjacent to all existing cubes of that color until they encounter other blocks.

Name: Ultima Slash
Desc: Slash once where the Sword Mark is.

Name: Score Reduction β
Desc: Reduce all Normal Blocks, regardless of color, by 1 unit.

Name: Sustain β
Desc: Generate multiple 1-unit blocks in the empty spaces adjacent to all existing Normal Blocks (regardless of color) until they encounter other blocks.

Name: Melody Simplification β
Desc: Divide all existing Normal Blocks, regardless of color, into 1-unit blocks.
